all articles from 2020 and on

natLang: Show all works from journals that are cited more than 100 tiems
works from journals with more than 100 citations
List works where the source is a journal and the work's citation count is more than 100

natLang: Get all english language works that are gold open access
Show me all works that are in English and are gold open access
Gold open access works that are in English

works from the National Science Foundation with an APC total less than 2000

Please show all Pubmed works or works that are not datasets
All works that are not datasets or are from Pubmed

description: 2 filters (type is not, primary_location.source.id is) with OR

natLang: works cited more than 50 times, or the grant id is R01GM126567-01
either more than 50 citations or the grant id is R01GM126567-01

description: 2 filters (cited_by_count is greater than, grants.award_id is) with OR

natLang: Get Japanese works or works with an APC less than 3000
Show me all works from Japan or works with an APC sum less than 3000
All works from Japan or works with an APC total less than 3000
oql: get works where authorships.countries is countries/JP or apc_sum is less than 3000
description: 2 filters (authorships.countries is, apc_sum is less than) with OR

natLang: Show me works by Charles Thomas Parker that are either non-articles or published in 2020
Works by Charles Thomas Parker that are not articles or are from 2020
oql: get works where ((publication_year is 2020 or type is not article) and authorships.author.id is authors/A5053617215)
description: Nested filter (publication_year OR type) AND authorships.author.id

natLang: Get me either works that are gold open access or are in English and have more than 100 citations
Show me works that are either 1. gold open access or 2. works in English that have been cited at least 100 times
All works that are in English and have at least 100 citations OR works that are designated as gold open access
oql: get works where ((cited_by_count is greater than 100 and language is English) or open_access.oa_status is gold)
description: Nested filter (cited_by_count AND language) OR open_access.oa_status

natLang: Get works from educational institutions that are either from a journal or have an APC less than 2000
Show me works that are either from a journal or have an APC total less than 2000. Also show educational institutions only
All works from educational institutions that are either from a journal or have an APC total less than 2000
oql: get works where (authorships.institutions.type is education and (primary_location.source.type is journal or apc_sum is less than 2000))
description: Nested filter authorships.institutions.type AND (primary_location.source.type OR apc_sum)

natLang: Show all works that are either Good health and well-being or are both funded by the National Science Foundation and were published after 2018
Works that are either related to the SDG for Good health and well-being or are funded by the National Science Foundation and were published after 2018
oql: get works where (sustainable_development_goals.id is sdgs/3 or (grants.funder is funders/F4320306076 and publication_year is greater than 2018))
description: Nested filter sustainable_development_goals.id OR (grants.funder AND publication_year)

natLang: I want to see either 1. works that reference W1775749144 and are from Europe or 2. works that are from journal ISSN 0140-6736 with more than 50 citations
Works that reference W1775749144 and are from Europe or works from the Lancet journal with more than 50 citations
oql: get works where ((referenced_works is works/W1775749144 and authorships.institutions.continent is continents/Q46) or (primary_location.source.issn is 0140-6736 and cited_by_count is greater than 50))
description: Nested filter (referenced_works AND authorships.institutions.continent) OR (primary_location.source.issn AND cited_by_count)

natLang: give me all works that are journal articles
could I please have all works that are articles
I want to see all works where the work type is article
oql: get works where type is types/article;

natLang: show me everything from 2020
Could I see all works from 2020?
I want to see all works that were published in 2020
oql: get works where publication_year is 2020;

natLang: show me all articles and their open access status, country, continent, if they are from the Global South, source type, if they are in an OA source
I want to see all articles with the following columns: open access, country, continent, Global South, source type, and OA source
give me everything with variables that show the country and continent, indicator if it is global south, whether it is open access, and whether the source is open access
oql: get works where type is article; return open access, Country, Continent, from Global South, source type, in OA source, language;

natLang: show me everything that is not an article
I want to see all works that are not articles
give me all works that are not articles
oql: get works where type is not article;

natLang: show me works that are open access status that is gold, published in 2020 and associated with Canada.
I want to see all works that are gold open access, published in 2020, and associated with Canada.
oql: get works where open_access.oa_status is gold and publication_year is 2020 and authorships.countries is countries/CA;

natLang: show me all institutions
oql: get works; summarize by institutions;

natLang: show me all authors sorted by their works count
oql: get works; summarize by authors; sort by count(works) desc;
get works where grants.funder is not test or authorships.author.id is 34578964; summarize by sources where display_name.search contains test; return display_name, type, issn;
get works where publication_year is 2021; summarize by institutions where country_code is countries/fr; sort by mean(fwci) desc; return display_name, mean(fwci);

get works where ((publication_year is 2020 or type is not types/article) and authorships.author.id is 23424534); summarize by institutions where country_code is fr; sort by count desc; return display_name, count;
get works where authorships.institutions.id is 123456; summarize by institutions; return display_name, ror, mean(fwci), count;
